description:
Region: North America, all regions

The Vice President Business Development is responsible for revenue generation derived from sales of SDVI Rally solutions to existing and prospective SDVI customers. The VP Business Development also understands the technical and operational complexities associated with media supply chains and is capable of identifying and recommending SDVI solutions that address specific customer needs. The VP Business Development is skilled at building highly trusted commercial and technical relationships with enterprise and department-level customer operations and engineering management.

Core Responsibilities
• Communicate the SDVI Rally value proposition to prospective and existing customers
• Assess prospect and media operations/customer supply chains
• Identify opportunities to optimize customer operations/supply chains using the Rally platform
• Help the customer develop a cloud-based supply chain strategy
• Recommend SDVI Rally deployment strategies to prospective and existing customers
• Demonstrate and explain SDVI Rally functionality
• Work closely with SDVI Application Services and deployment partners
• Develop and execute Land and Expand sales plans
• Develop and lead quarterly business reviews with each customer
• Lead and manage the customer commercial relationship
• Create customer quotations and bid responses
• Lead the drafting and negotiation of Master Sales Agreements
• Work closely with the SDVI Financial and Legal teams regarding the terms and conditions of Master Sales Agreements
• Work closely with the SDVI Marketing Team regarding Go-To-Market initiatives
• Work closely with the SDVI Product Team regarding product strategies
• Forecast revenue for prospective and existing customers
• Track all sales activities in Salesforce
• Maintain sales pipeline reports

Skills & Experience
• 10 years business development or sales experience in the Media & Entertainment industry
• Knowledge of media operations use cases
• Knowledge of media processing applications
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills
• Excellent presentation skills
• Experience with Salesforce

Personal Attributes
• Passion for building high-trust business relationships
• High integrity
• Customer first
• Team player
• High energy and self-directed
• Strategic thinker
• Fast learner
• Comfortable with travel
• Comfortable in a fully-distributed company environment

Salary range $150,000 to $250,000 (plus commission)

Salary range represents the expected range for this position and is based on a number of factors, including location, and may vary depending on job-related knowledge, skills, and experience. Pay ranges are US applicable only.

Who is SDVI?

The media supply chain is the “factory floor” of the Media & Entertainment industry. Traditional on-premise supply chains are inefficient and slow to respond to changing requirements. The need to significantly improve supply chain performance is driving the industry to the cloud.

SDVI is the market leader in cloud-based media supply chains for the Media & Entertainment industry.

SDVI is a fast-growing and highly-regarded young company at the forefront of the evolving Media & Entertainment industry. Many of the biggest names in Media & Entertainment rely on the SDVI Rally platform to prepare and deliver their content to millions of people. Our customers include Apple, A E Networks, CTS, Disney, NBCU, Paramount, Sky, TVU and Warner Bros. Discovery. Warner Bros. Discovery, Sky and Fox are also investors in SDVI.

SDVI is one of very few companies in the industry that is SOC-2 Type 2 certified, TPN Gold certified, and Net Zero. We also received an Emmy in 2019 along with Discovery, Disney, and AWS for “Pioneering Public Cloud-based Media Supply Chains”.

You Should Be Interested in SDVI Because:
• You are looking for your next big challenge
• You are looking for a company that welcomes your talent no matter where you live
• You are an A player who wants to work with other A players
• You want to be part of a team that respects individuals and their work
• You consider the big picture and your contribution to it

We believe that the ideal company is a tight-knit team pursuing excellence and having fun along the way. SDVI is a completely distributed company with staff in 18 states and 6 countries looking to grow our team. Are you ready to join us?

SDVI offers a comprehensive benefits package including competitive salary, medical, vision, dental, 401(k) match, and stock options in a stimulating and rewarding distributed work environment.

SDVI is committed to Diversity, Equity, and Inclusivity in our workforce. We maintain a courteous work environment that recognizes the dignity and worth of each employee. SDVI respects the individual needs of employees and is an equal-opportunity employer.
